title: Coastal dunes
creator_credit: Eric Harrison, Julia Spark and Granada Television International
brief_description: Uses an experimental approach to explain the process of saltation (sand movement) in a typical English coastal dune system. Also explains the interrelationships that exist between vegetation and soil type - the changing nature of these two elements is shown by a transect taken across a typical dune system.
